graph_title: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
indicator_name: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
